attributes.action: government to speak up and raise action against what is happening in Palestine
attributes.additional_details:
I WANT THE PARLIAMENT TO RAISE THE MATTER TO THE UNITED NATIONS AND OTHER COUNTRIES TO BRING ACTION AND LEGAL SUPPORT AND JUSTICE TO PALESTINE THEY MUST DO SOMETHING AS THIS IS NOT JUST LETTING FELLOW HUMANS AND MUSLIM BROTHERS AND SISTERS SUFFER DUE TO A GLOBAL AND INTERNATIONAL CRISIS WHICH IS BEING IGNORED
If someone did that to a church or a synagogue I’m sure everyone would point fingers and go crazy world wide so why aren’t the UK government taking action or showing any awareness to other fellow humans in need of such support and safety from the inhumane acts caused by Israel
attributes.background: We want the government to raise the minimum standard we always hear them brag about as they claim to help and support the UK economy and its people , but why aren’t they helping and raising awareness globally and supporting Palestine and the innocent people hurt from the attacks.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Condemn Israel for their actions against Palestinians and impose trade ban: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636256

Take action to prevent expulsion of residents from Masafer Yatta: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625771

Ban military exports to Israel and investigate use of UK arms by Israel: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/633252

If you want the Government to take a different action to the above petitions you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
